_header: All sins shall thou hate through casting of skill
_description: An Exhortation against Sin — six monorhyming quatrains with medial rhymes, or six 8-line stanzas, abababab

CULDd564.First Lines:
all synnes sal þu hate / thorow castyng of skylleAnd
                    ȝherne to gang in þe gate / þat es with owten illeTumbyl
                    noght fra þe state / þat þu hase tane þe tilleIt ledes
                    til þe kynges ȝhate / þare þu may layke þi
                    fille…
CULDd564.Last Lines:
…Owre setels heuen ar with in / me lyst sytt in myneLufe
                    criste & hate syn / & sa purges þe þine
CULDd564.Note:
Follows 5167 and
                    precedes 3483 (both of which are
                    short-line stanzas as this would be if 8-line stanzas).

Longleat29.First Lines:
Al synnes shal þou hate Throgh kastynge of skyllAnd desyre to
                    go in þe gate þat is withouten ille…
Longleat29.Last Lines:
…Our setys heuen ben wyth in Me list see in mynloue Crist
                    & hate syn And so purgeth thyne Amen
